text:
Temporarily free: 5 cool games on iPhone with a big discount
04 Nov 2019, 20:30 by Stepan Balmond
We talk about the most profitable purchases that you can make today in the App Store.
Our selection includes: conquering outer space, a gloomy puzzle, launching a real shuttle, ghosts in a cemetery and the world of forgotten kingdoms.
Conquer space
‚úîÔ∏è 529 rub. > 299 rub.








Download QR-Code Star Traders: FrontiersDeveloper: Trese BrothersPrice: 299 p.


















































































Good graphics and an interesting plot - what could be better? Build your invincible team that can defeat the alien troops and conquer the whole cosmos.
In your arsenal will be not only the best intergalactic ships, but also modern weapons that can destroy even the most trained enemy. The user himself plays on behalf of the captain of the space gang.
Get out of the dangerous maze
‚úîÔ∏è 299 rub. > 75 rub.








Download QR-Code StarmanDeveloper: nada studio, slPrice: 75 p. +













































































A gloomy world from which it is not so easy to get out. Go through difficult levels in the most unpredictable locations and be prepared for the fact that, even starting from the beginning, the scenario you completed will not be repeated a second time.
Perhaps one of the most stylish games that can be found on the App Store.
Launch shuttle in outer space
‚úîÔ∏è 149 rub. > free








Download QR-Code Space AgencyDeveloper: NooleusPrice: Free +
In this game you need to be careful from the very beginning: launch the space shuttle and make sure that it safely reaches outer space, and all its details are separated on time.
After a successful start, the player will be able to launch their own satellites and even create their own space station. The main thing is to learn how to properly manage it. Well, a good preparation for those who want to become real astronauts.
Make friends with the dark world
‚úîÔ∏è 529 rub. > 229 rub.








Download QR-Code Redemption Cemetery. On the verge of death (Full) Developer: Big Fish Games, IncPrice: 529 p.




















































At night you find yourself in a cemetery, where spirits and ghosts walk. Your goal is to calm them and return calm to this place of sorrow and sadness.
Find items hidden throughout the cemetery. They will be able to lead you to the guardian of the necropolis, which is held captive by the spirits, and tell about the fate of each of the ghosts.
The case when you not only train your wits, but also spend time with benefit: immersion in the other world in this game is almost one hundred percent.
Restore balance in the kingdom
‚úîÔ∏è 749 rub. > 599 rub.








Download QR-Code Icewind DaleDeveloper: Overhaul GamesPrice: 599 p.




















































The world of the northern kingdoms has never been so fragile. The player needs to restore balance in him, taking part in battles with magical creatures, dangerous as never before.
At your disposal - a huge number of magic items and spells that will help you win the battle with the mystical world. Gather your squad, which will forever rid the kingdom of fear of sorcerers.
Here are the coolest action cameras for epic videos:
